org.springframework.context

Class ApplicationEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSubProtocolEvent, ApplicationContextEvent, BrokerAvailabilityEvent, PayloadApplicationEvent, RequestHandledEvent

    public abstract class ApplicationEvent
extends EventObject
    Class to be extended by all application events. Abstract as it doesn't make sense for generic events to be published directly.
    Author:
    Rod Johnson, Juergen Hoeller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
